title: Mysterious Tarapoto 4D/3N

itinerary.day: Day 01: Flight & Native City Tour in Lamas

activities.text: Arrival at the hotel and check-in. Free morning to acclimate.

We begin the tour in Lamas, considered the folklore capital of the Peruvian Amazon and the city of three natural levels, where nature, folklore, and culture intertwine—an ideal place for your vacation (native neighborhood, viewpoint, and crafts).

Departure to Laguna Azul. Traveling via the Fernando Belaúnde Terry South highway to Puerto López where we cross the Huallaga River by captive raft. We then arrive at the majestic Laguna Azul, covering 430.80 hectares with an approximate depth of 35 meters. The lagoon is home to a variety of fish, birds, and flora. The excursion includes a motorboat ride on the lagoon, visit to the Dos de Mayo village, swimming, jet skiing, and optional canopy activity.

itinerary.day: Day 03: Alto Mayo Tour – Rioja & Moyobamba

activities.text: Located north of Tarapoto, the tour includes visits to the cities of Moyobamba and Rioja. We will visit an orchid garden and the San Mateo hot springs.
Visit to the source of the Tioyacu River, adventure in a local theme park, caves, and we’ll finish with a refreshing swim in the crystal-clear waters.
Return to the hotel and dinner.

Lunch. Visit to the Ahuashiyacu waterfall, a natural fall located in the Amazon district of San Martín. It is 14 km from the nearest city center. Enjoyment at the waterfall and free afternoon. Departure to the airport at the appropriate time.
